creator: osmadja@gmail.com
text:
When deploying a WAR that has a file in it with a name like 'Cópia de '*, Tomcat throws the following exception:
A war that reproduce the problem has been attached.

07/03/2008 10:13:29 org.apache.catalina.core.AprLifecycleListener lifecycleEvent
INFO: The Apache Tomcat Native library which allows optimal performance in production environments was not found on the java.library.path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;.;C:\WINDOWS\system32;C:\WINDOWS;C:\oraclexe\app\oracle\product\10.2.0\server\bin;C:\WINDOWS\system32;C:\WINDOWS;C:\WINDOWS\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Roxio Shared\DLLShared\;C:\o\tools\apache-ant-1.6.5\bin;O:\myProjects\cetip\projects\ranger\dev\apache-maven-2.0.8\bin

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Your war file is malformed. I get this error if I use 7zip to create the war but if I use the jar command line tool and set URIEncoding="UTF-8" in the connector then it works correctly.
